content:
CP 618 Firestop putty stick Easily moldable and reusable firestop putty designed to help create a fire and smoke barrier around cables and metal pipes ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Firestop putties- - - ### FEATURES:Features Quicker, simpler to install and reusable – fire putty does not harden over time Approval for virtually any transit type – telecom, low- and medium-voltage cables, conduits, metal pipes and blank openings Adheres to concrete, masonry and gypsum wall assemblies Mold and mildew resistant Acoustically tested according to ASTM E90 Applications Non-hardening, firestop putty for single or bundled cables and non-combustible pipe penetrations For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Approx. Density: 1.6 kg/m³ Color: Red Surface burning characteristics UL 723 (ASTM E84): Flame spread: 15Smoke development: 10 Technical Data | Approx. Density | 1.6 kg/m³ | Color | Red | Surface burning characteristics UL 723 (ASTM E84) | Flame spread: 15
Smoke development: 10 | LEED VOC | 5 g/l | Application temperature range | 32 - 104 °F | Storage and transportation temperature range | 23 - 104 °F | Volume per unit | 18 in³ | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 314721 - Putty stick CP 618 - Package Size 12 pc Package Contents: - 1x CP 618 Firestop putty stick
